mapper.sql: type AS "type", customer_id AS "customerId", receipt_id AS "receiptId",anomaly_id AS "anomalyId",real_number AS "realNumber", instock_log_detail_id AS "instockLogDetailId", instock_log_id AS "instockLogId",source AS "source",source_id AS "sourceId", inkind_id AS "inkindId", sku_id AS "skuId", brand_id AS "brandId", number AS "number", instock_order_id AS "instockOrderId", storehouse_id AS "storehouseId", storehouse_positions_id AS "storehousePositionsId", create_time AS "createTime", create_user AS "createUser", update_time AS "updateTime", update_user AS "updateUser", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_erp_instock_log_detail where 1 = 1
and instock_log_detail_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.instockLogDetailId},'%')
and instock_log_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.instockLogId},'%')
and inkind_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inkindId},'%')
and sku_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.skuId},'%')
and brand_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.brandId},'%')
and number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.number},'%')
and instock_order_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.instockOrderId},'%')
and storehouse_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.storehouseId},'%')
and storehouse_positions_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.storehousePositionsId},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and source = #{paramCondition.source}
and source_id = #{paramCondition.sourceId}
and sku_id in ( select sku_id from goods_sku where sku_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.skuName},'%') union select sku_id from goods_sku where standard like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.skuName},'%') union select sku_id from goods_sku where spu_id in (select spu_id from goods_spu where name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.skuName},'%') ) )
order by create_time

select
from daoxin_erp_instock_log_detail where 1 = 1
and instock_log_detail_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.instockLogDetailId},'%')
and instock_log_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.instockLogId},'%')
and inkind_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inkindId},'%')

and brand_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.brandId},'%')
and number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.number},'%')
and instock_order_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.instockOrderId},'%')
and storehouse_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.storehouseId},'%')
and storehouse_positions_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.storehousePositionsId},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and source = #{paramCondition.source}
and source_id = #{paramCondition.sourceId}
